post_content:
A fairly tough card to find in an  off back. He comes both in the 150 and 350 series and while pops are relatively the same I almost never see the 150 come up for whatever reason. None presently for sale on ebay (there's 1 350).

A PSA 2 did $183 last night in Goldin.

Sold here or via PM trumps any offers or on going negotiations. Price is net to me and delivered. Thanks for looking.

$100 ***SOLD***

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53407252124_4b3d2d458a_c_d.jpg[/IMG]
